figma: Type text, right click and add outline stroke
 -> add stroke on right panel
 -> change stroke width to like 5px
 -> remove fill 
 -> copy svg

May need to remove masks and or other shapes that come along.
e.g. replace mask="url(#path-1-outside-1)" with ' '.

with photoshop remove fill:<asd> from inline css (.cls-1)
